Thanks Julian,
I guess I mean in the public or private sector job
wise. Like working for company X or government
organization Y.

Rog

--- Julian Togelius <julian@...> wrote:
> Depends a little bit on what you are aiming at: do
> you mean taking a
> taught course, doing a PhD or getting hired as a
> lecturer? Or do you
> mean the private sector?
> 
> I did my MSc at the University of Sussex, Brighton,
> UK. They have a
> very strong group in the area, especially when it
> comes to evolving
> neural nets for autonomous agents (as opposed to
> pure pattern
> recognition), and a lot of interdisciplinarity -
> people from biology,
> philosophy and informatics really take an interest
> in each other's
> work. Brighton is a nice place to live as well.
> 
> Julian
>
